entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is a government institution that deals with magical law and order. It is mentioned as an option for Voldemort to join.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He is described as working at Borgin and Burkes and having a past connection with Hogwarts.

entities.name: borgin and burkes
entities.description: Borgin and Burkes is an organization where Voldemort worked. It is mentioned as a place that held attractions for him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story. He is described as being amazed by Voldemort's past connection with Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wise and powerful wizard who is a mentor to Harry. He is mentioned as having confided in him about Voldemort's past.

entities.name: hokey
entities.description: Hokey is a person whose memory is being accessed by Dumbledore. It is implied that Hokey has information about Voldemort's past connection with Hogwarts.

entities.name: professor dippet
entities.description: Professor Dippet is the then Headmaster of Hogwarts who was approached by Voldemort to remain as a teacher.

relationships.description: Voldemort worked at Borgin and Burkes.
Voldemort had a past connection with Hogwarts, which was revealed to Harry by Dumbledore.
Dumbledore accessed the memory of Hokey to learn more about Voldemort's past connection with Hogwarts.
Voldemort approached Professor Dippet to remain as a teacher at Hogwarts.
